name: Erosion02
description:
This NFT re-generates every hour a unique art. When an edition is bought, that art will be saved for everyone to see in the "history" – persisted collection that is browsable by everyone on that NFT itself.

In other words: The last item shows a volatile preview, unique for your wallet and saved if you BUY. You can come back every hour and only buy when you find something good!

This art is plottable physically with fountain pens (21cm by 21cm) and @greweb is happy to deliver physical plots for anyone who BUY on this generator. Please PM me to confirm this is still a possibility.
